✕

Premier Pour Bartending

# The Ultimate Mobile Bar + Bartending Service for Weddings, Corporate Events,
Private Parties, Fundraisers, + more...

We pour the drinks. You enjoy yourself.®

 __Request a Quote

SPECIAL EVENT BARTENDING, MADE SIMPLE.

## Your Full Service Mobile Bartending Solution

We know how much this occasion means to you. You’ve been hard at work planning
the details, and you want everything to go perfectly. Most importantly, you
want your guests to be entertained, served well, and taken care of. Among all
the components you’re concerned with, we’re here to handle one of the most
vital parts of your event for you, the drink service.

Whether you’re hosting your company’s holiday party or a sophisticated wedding
reception, Premier Pour is dedicated to creating an experience your guests be
talking about long after the lights turn up for closing time. Relax & enjoy
yourself as we create your cocktail menu, entertain your guests and provide
incredible drinks & service.

#### Relax. Let Us Do All The Work

When it comes to serving drinks for your party, we’ll take care of it all.
From alcohol estimates and costing to menu planning and custom cocktail
creation, you’ll be comforted knowing that the details of your beverage
service are being handled by professionals. With Premier Pour, you can loosen
up and enjoy your event, worry-free.

Learn more

#### Serious Cocktail Craftsmanship

Sometimes, beer and wine just won’t do for everyone. From an exceptionally
made Old Fashioned or martinis to rounds of custom specialty cocktails, your
guests appreciate having a wide range of drink options. You’ll make your
guests feel special, not just because you’re awesome, but because you’ve
provided them with exactly what you knew they wanted, a delicious, handcrafted
cocktail.

Learn more

#### Bring The Party To You

Hosting with professional bartenders takes your event to the next level. A
full-service bar adds an exciting dynamic to your event that can’t be
replicated by other means. You’ll be happy to know your guests are in good
hands, being entertained and served by our hand-picked, professional staff.
(Witty bartender banter included at no extra charge).

Learn more

Ready to host an amazing event?

 __

Request your price quote today to get the process + party started!

### Cost Efficient Drink Services

We’ve set out to bring you the best party imaginable while being cost-
efficient for your event, so you come in under budget. Next to hiring a
chainsaw juggling circus clown, there isn’t much else that will entertain your
guests, create a lively party, and give you as much value for the cost. Most
importantly, our entertainment comes in the form of crafting ridiculously good
drinks exclusively for you and your guests. Don't hesitate, contact us today!

### Our Simple Process Makes Your Event Planning Easy

Working with us is as straightforward as filling out a form and having a quick
conversation to solidify the details. We come to your event, bring the best
drinks and even better service, and leave you and your guest imbibed and
satisfied. With over 10 years of experience throwing parties, from small
private parties to giant wedding receptions, we have our methods down to a
science. We’ll make sure your event is efficient and amazing.

### The Mobile Bartending Service Everyone Is Talking About

Don’t just take our word for it. We started out as a one-man-show, helping a
few friends add some flair to their events as the dedicated bartender, and
since then, Premier Pour Bartending has grown into the best bartending service
for hire in the greater Toledo, Ohio and Southern Michigan areas. We’ve helped
turn hundreds of events, large and small, into exceptional experiences, and we
have the track record to prove it. We travel, too!

Request a Quote __

#### There Are A Lot Of Reasons Why We’re The Best Bartending Service In
Northwest Ohio, Southeast Michigan, Toledo, Ann Arbor, and Detroit, And The
Surrounding Areas

✪ We take the pressure off your shoulders

You’ll have a blast knowing we’re entertaining your guests and have all the
beverage details covered

✪ Instantly raise the energy level of your event

Let us charm, wow and treat your guests with our professional, energetic staff

✪ Keep your guests entertained

There’s an allure to watching a bartender work their magic, and although we
won’t be juggling chainsaws like that clown you wanted to hire, we’ll make
sure to put on a show

✪ You can relax

We’ll show up early and pump up the party throughout the event, staying as
late as the party goes and until everything is fully cleaned

✪ Freedom to select your perfect venue

With our multiple, efficient, state of the art, portable yet sizable bars,
we’ll show up and hydrate your guests anywhere, anytime. It doesn’t matter if
there isn’t room for a bar, we’ll make room

Request a Quote __

## Professional Bartending Services

Here’s a look at what we can do for you. Just take a look, and if you don’t
see a service that fits your needs, just send us a message for a custom quote!

View All Services

# Services & Pricing

At Premier Pour Bartending, we understand that no two events are alike. Your
special occasion is as unique as you are, and that's why we take pride in
offering personalized bartending services that cater to your individual needs.
Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our transparent pricing model,
ensuring you receive exceptional service without any hidden costs.

 __Request a Quote

## Services We Provide

Unleash Unforgettable Moments: Premier Pour Bartending Services – Elevate Your
Events with Professionalism, Style, and Infinite Possibilities!

### Your Full Service Mobile Bartending Solution

Welcome to Premier Pour Bartending, where we bring a touch of excellence to
your events with our comprehensive range of services. From insurance-backed
professionalism to top-notch bar equipment, we've got every aspect covered for
an exceptional experience.

#### Insurance + Certification

  *  __Fully insured with $1MM commercial general + liquor liability insurance with blanket venue coverage + W2 employees covered by workers compensation insurance.
  *  __ServSafe Alcohol® trained + certified bartenders.

#### Professional Bar Equipment

  *  __Multiple portable bars | Customization + branding options.
  *  __Shaker tins, strainers, mixing glasses, speed pourers, jiggers.
  *  __Garnish trays, cutting boards, knives, bottle openers.
  *  __Ice scoops, bar mats, towels, coolers + more.

#### Standard Included Supplies

  * __9oz + 12oz clear plastic drinkware, bar tools.
  *  __Coke, Diet Coke, 7UP, Ginger Ale, Club Soda, Tonic.
  *  __Bottled water, cranberry juice, orange juice.
  *  __Lemon + lime garnishes.
  *  __Grenadine, lime juice, simple syrup, sour mix.

#### Infinite Possibilities

  *  __Elevate your event with our specialty cocktail service, featuring premium + gourmet supplies.
  *  __Opt for an upscale touch with our selection of upgraded Tossware® drinkware options.
  *  __Explore a multitude of additional options to personalize + enhance your bartending + beverage experience.

#### Additional Service Options

  *  __Multiple bar area service + access additional bartenders, bar backs + cocktail servers to tailor your event staffing.
  *  __Leverage our network of preferred suppliers for a seamless + high-quality service.
  *  __Consult with us for professional guidance on alcohol selection + purchasing, with convenient delivery options available.
  *  __Inquire about a variety of service options to customize + elevate your bartending + beverage experience based on your unique preferences + event requirements.

#### The Legal Side of Things...

Due to state liquor laws, the event host is required to purchase + provide all
alcoholic beverages which leads to substantial cost savings. We work with the
event host to create a drink menu + detailed beverage plan to complement each
and every event. We also work with a network of preferred suppliers to
facilitate + coordinate the purchase + delivery of alcohol.

## Custom Bar Graphics + Design

#### Custom Graphics

Looking to upgrade the style and vibe of your event? Elevate your event's
style with our diverse, customizable options. Whether it's a corporate
function or a wedding, we cater to your unique needs. Let us guide you through
countless possibilities for an unforgettable experience that exceeds all
expectations.

#### Event Branding

Want to impress your guests? We can showcase your brand, or tailor the color,
theme, and branding to match your theme. Sleek LED lighting can add a stylish
touch, ensuring a memorable experience for your guests. Contact us now to make
your event uniquely unforgettable! Cheers to customization!

Learn More

Request a Quote __

Service Areas

Wondering where Premier Pour Bartending provides services?

We provide service in Northwest Ohio including Toledo, Maumee, Perrysburg,
Sylvania, Bowling Green, Whitehouse, Findlay, Lima, Sandusky, Marblehead, Port
Clinton, Fremont, Huron, Vermilion, and surrounding areas. We also provide
services in Southeast Michigan including Ann Arbor, Chelsea, Dexter, Detroit,
Royal Oak, Oakland, Dearborn, Clarklake, Devils Lake, Brooklyn, Lansing,
Tecumseh, Adrian, Monroe, and more. We are available to provide services
throughout the entire state of Ohio and Michigan, as well as Florida.

##### Where else?

It’s possible for us to work events outside of our regular service areas
depending on a number of factors, including size of the party, travel
distance, and available bartenders nearby. There will likely be extra costs
for travel time and expenses, but we’re more than happy to work out an
agreement. Click here to contact us and discuss the details.

If you’re ready to reserve us for your next event, or just want to find out
more information, click the button below to get a quote for your party.

Request a Quote __

Events We Service

Looking for the perfect addition to your special event?

Whether you're hosting a wedding, corporate event, fundraiser, private party,
birthday party, holiday party, graduation, networking event, or any other type
of event, Premier Pour Bartending is here to provide top-notch bartending
services that will make your event a success.

 __ __Weddings

At Premier Pour Bartending, we know that your wedding day is one of the most
important days of your life. That's why we provide top-notch bartending
services that will make your big day even more special. Our team of
professional bartenders is highly skilled and experienced in crafting
delicious cocktails and providing exceptional service that will leave your
guests impressed.

____Corporate Events

If you're hosting a corporate event, you want everything to go smoothly, and
that includes the bar service. At Premier Pour Bartending, we understand the
importance of impressing your clients and colleagues. Our team of professional
bartenders will create a custom cocktail menu that will suit the theme and
tone of your event perfectly.

____Fundraisers

If you're hosting a fundraiser, you want to make sure that your guests have a
great time while supporting your cause. At Premier Pour Bartending, we can
help you do just that! Our team of professional bartenders will keep the
drinks flowing and the atmosphere lively, ensuring that your guests have a
great time and are more likely to donate to your cause.

____Private Parties

Whether you're hosting a small gathering of friends or a large celebration,
Premier Pour Bartending is here to make sure that your party is a success. Our
team of professional bartenders will work with you to create a custom cocktail
menu that will suit your taste and budget. From craft cocktails to classic
drinks, we've got you covered.

____Birthday Parties

At Premier Pour Bartending, we know that your birthday is a special occasion.
That's why we provide top-notch bartending services that will make your party
even more memorable. Our team of professional bartenders is highly skilled and
experienced in crafting delicious cocktails and providing exceptional service
that will leave your guests impressed.

____Holiday Parties

The holiday season is a time for celebration, and Premier Pour Bartending is
here to help you make the most of it. Our team of professional bartenders will
create a custom cocktail menu that will suit the theme and tone of your party
perfectly. From festive drinks to classic cocktails, we've got you covered.

____Graduation Parties

Graduating is a major accomplishment, and it deserves to be celebrated in
style. Premier Pour Bartending is here to help you do just that! Our team of
professional bartenders will work with you to create a custom cocktail menu
that will suit your taste and budget. From craft cocktails to classic drinks,
we've got you covered.

____Networking Events

Networking events are all about making connections, and Premier Pour
Bartending can help you do just that. Our team of professional bartenders will
keep the drinks flowing and the atmosphere lively, ensuring that your guests
have a great time and are more likely to make valuable connections with one
another.

____Concerts + Festivals

If you're hosting a music festival or concert, you want to make sure that your
guests have access to quality drinks and exceptional service. Premier Pour
Bartending can provide experienced bartenders, customized drink menus, and
professional bar equipment to help you elevate the guest experience. Whether
it's 500 guests or 20,000 - we've got you covered!

____Other Types of Events

Art Shows and Exhibitions Pop-up Events Food and Wine Festivals Film Festivals
Galas and Award Ceremonies Trade Shows and Conferences Product Launches
Fashion Shows Charity Events Cocktail Parties Bar/Bat Mitzvahs Baby Showers
Bridal Showers Engagement Parties Anniversaries Retirement Parties Reunions
Sporting Events Boat Parties VIP Events Conventions and Expos Cultural
Festivals Housewarming Parties Launch Parties
